name: New Polynomers Clicker ALPHA

New Polynomers Clicker Is a cookie clicker type of game with its own Chat, Marketplace, Trading! (THIS IS ALPHA, THESE ARE NOT PRESENT IN ALPHA (except chat))


Features:
  • 7 Pets to unlock
  • 5+ Upgrades
  • Verification System
  • Global Chat
Remember: This is an alpha so lots of features are still not added!
